title: UNIX - REMOVE THE SECURITY IN SCRIPT IN PROD THAT PREVENTS ATLAS DATE MODIFICATION

task_list.instruction_title:
Unistall the security in script that prevent the date modification in production environment

faire un « touch /root/AllowChangeSystemDateInProd.ok » sur root@nhprdadm (axvgvarisprd01p)

Note : Restore of Atlas security in performed in IP Task [TRT-14392](TRT-14392_116110094.html)
